photo.sentence: Can we take a photo together?

power.sentence: The power went out during the storm.

while.sentence: Can you sing while you dance?

care.sentence: Please take good care of your pets.

down.sentence: The sun goes down in the evening.

total.sentence: What's the total number of toys you have?

place.sentence: What's your favorite place to visit?

end.sentence: What happens at the end of the story?

him.sentence: Can you give him the blue crayon?

without.sentence: Can you eat cereal without milk?

think.sentence: What do you think we should do today?

big.sentence: Is an elephant big or small?

water.sentence: Remember to drink plenty of water.

history.sentence: Do you like learning about history?

pictures.sentence: Let's draw pictures of our family.

size.sentence: What size shoes do you wear?

personal.sentence: This is my personal favorite book.

since.sentence: How long has it been since breakfast?

including.sentence: Let's invite everyone, including your little brother.

guide.sentence: Can you guide me to the playground?

shop.sentence: Let's shop for new school supplies.

change.sentence: Did you change into your pajamas?

text.sentence: Can you read the text on this sign?

children.sentence: How many children are in your class?

during.sentence: What do you like to do during recess?

return.sentence: When will you return the library books?

students.sentence: How many students are in your school?

love.sentence: Do you love eating ice cream?

main.sentence: What's the main color of your backpack?

call.sentence: Let's call grandma to say hello!

hours.sentence: How many hours did you sleep last night?

image.sentence: Can you draw an image of your pet?

title.sentence: What's the title of your favorite book?

why.sentence: Why do you think the sky is blue?

still.sentence: Can you stand still like a statue?

money.sentence: Do you save your pocket money?

every.sentence: Do you brush your teeth every day?

little.sentence: Can you speak a little louder, please?

visit.sentence: When will you visit your grandparents?

save.sentence: Don't forget to save your game progress!
